data.title: School trip to Oceanarium
data.description: Our class will visit Lisbon Oceanarium to have some contact with aquatic species like sharks and rays.

data.description: School invites you to join our sports day event at School. There will be team mini tournaments of football and volleyball. Join us!

data.description: The school will gather all parents and present theatrical pieces, instrumental songs and other surprises in the gym space.

data.description: Describe the word Elaborar and find 5 Synonyms and Antonyms for that word.

data.description: This semester we will be learning the flute. Don't forget to bring the instrument to class.

data.title: Food Chains Final Project due
data.description: Describe herbivores, carnivores and omnivores animals and give examples of those.
